articles.author: Angeline Jane Bernabe
articles.title: 'Mary Poppins' actress Glynis Johns dies at 100 - Good Morning America
articles.description: Academy Award-nominated actress Glynis Johns has died.
articles.content:
Glynis Johns, the British actress best known for her role as Mrs. Winifred Banks in "Mary Poppins," has died of natural causes, her publicist said. She was 100.
Johns starred alongside Julie Andrews… [+1684 chars]
